name: Change Color To Reach Points
description:
"Change Color To Reach Points" is an addictive game that test your judge and response capacity.

"Change Color To Reach Points" is a color Puzzle game.

"Change Color To Reach Points" has many black spots.

click to change the grid color, grid comes in three colors, the order is red, blue, yellow,and arrived at the green grid to the next level.

You lose if the same color grid appears in two or more black points.

Come and experience it.
